We have been here four times and it never disapoints! My husband eats gluten free and it is fabulous to be at a restaurant with some many options and that treat eating gluten as nothing strange.  Last night we went again and we had two gluten free pizzas so we could share... Isabel and Caprichosa. Both so good and you couldn't even tell they were gluten free. They also have gluten free beer, including Ambar and Daura. Our new place for celebrations.
